name: reitti
description: Reitti is a self-hosted task management and organization tool for teams. It offers projects, boards, versioning, and a responsive UI with privacy-first design.
features: Project boards: Organize tasks using Kanban-style boards with customizable columns and workflows.
Task management: Create, assign, and track tasks with due dates, priorities, and status updates.
Team collaboration: Share projects with team members and assign responsibilities across the organization.
Version control: Track changes to tasks and projects with a complete history of modifications.
Custom fields: Add project-specific metadata fields to capture relevant information for your workflow.
File attachments: Upload documents, images, and files directly to tasks for centralized reference.
Comment threads: Discuss tasks with team members using threaded conversations and mentions.
Search and filter: Find tasks quickly by searching across titles, descriptions, tags, and assignees.
Notifications: Receive alerts when tasks are assigned, updated, or approaching deadlines.
Mobile responsive: Manage projects and tasks from smartphones and tablets with a touch-optimized interface.
Privacy focused: Host your own instance to keep project data under your control without third-party access.
Export functionality: Download project data in standard formats for backup or migration to other tools.
